message.content:
Update all version numbers to 6.0.3 in SPLICE project.

Files to edit:
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-backend/package.json (0.1.0 → 6.0.3)
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/package.json (0.1.0 → 6.0.3)
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml (6.0.2 → 6.0.3, both ExtensionBundleVersion and Version)
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/js/config.js (VERSION: '6.0.2' → '6.0.3')
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx (SPLICE_VERSION = "6.0.2" → "6.0.3")
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-plugin/manifest.json (3.5.0 → 6.0.3)
- /Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-backend/routes/health.js (5.6.0 → 6.0.3)

After fixing, grep for old versions (0.1.0, 3.5.0, 5.6.0, 6.0.2) to confirm none remain. If found, fix and re-test until clean.

file.content:
{
  "name": "splice-backend",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "Backend for SPLICE - Audio analysis and take detection",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "node --watch server.js",
    "lint": "eslint --config eslint.config.cjs .",
    "lint:fix": "eslint --config eslint.config.cjs . --fix"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@aws-sdk/client-s3": "^3.958.0",
    "@aws-sdk/s3-request-presigner": "^3.958.0",
    "bullmq": "^5.66.3",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "dotenv": "^16.4.5",
    "express": "^4.21.0",
    "fast-xml-parser": "^5.3.3",
    "groq-sdk": "^0.8.0",
    "helmet": "^8.1.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.3",
    "openai": "^4.73.0",
    "pg": "^8.16.3",
    "stripe": "^20.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "eslint": "^9.39.2"
  }
}

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.2"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.2"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="14.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.content:
1→/**
     2→ * Health Check Routes
     3→ *
     4→ * System health and status endpoints
     5→ */
     6→
     7→const express = require('express');
     8→const { isFFprobeInstalled } = require('../services/ffprobeSilence');
     9→const { isReplicateConfigured } = require('../services/vocalIsolation');
    10→
    11→/**
    12→ * Create health routes
    13→ * @param {Object} options - Route configuration options
    14→ * @returns {express.Router}
    15→ */
    16→function createHealthRoutes(_options = {}) {
    17→  const router = express.Router();
    18→
    19→  /**
    20→   * GET / - API information
    21→   */
    22→  router.get('/', (req, res) => {
    23→    res.json({
    24→      service: 'splice-backend',
    25→      version: '5.6.0',
    26→      endpoints: {
    27→        'GET /': 'This info',
    28→        'GET /health': 'Health check',
    29→        'GET /ffprobe-check': 'Check if FFprobe is installed',
    30→        'GET /replicate-check': 'Check if Replicate API is configured',
    31→        'POST /analyze': 'Analyze WAV file { wavPath }',
    32→        'POST /silences': 'Detect silences via Whisper gaps { wavPath, threshold: 0.5 }',
    33→        'POST /silences-audio': 'Detect silences via FFprobe { wavPath, threshold: -30, minDuration: 0.5, padding: 0.1 }',
    34→        'POST /silences-rms': 'Detect silences via RMS analysis { wavPath, threshold: -30, minSilenceLength: 0.5, paddingStart: 0.1, paddingEnd: 0.05, autoThreshold: false, sensitivity: 50 }',
    35→        'POST /profanity': 'Detect profanity in transcript { wavPath, language: "en", customBlocklist: [], customAllowlist: [] }',
    36→        'GET /profanity/languages': 'Get supported languages for profanity detection',
    37→        'GET /profanity/bleeps': 'Get available bleep sounds',
    38→        'POST /repetitions': 'Detect phrase repetitions and stutters { wavPath, phraseSize: 5, tolerance: 0.7, useOpenAI: false }',
    39→        'POST /fillers': 'Detect filler words (um, uh, like, etc.) { wavPath, customFillers: [] }',
    40→        'POST /stutters': 'Detect single-word stutters only { wavPath, minRepeats: 2 }',
    41→        'POST /export/captions': 'Export transcript to caption format { wavPath, format: srt|vtt|txt|json, outputPath? }',
    42→        'GET /export/formats': 'Get supported caption export formats',
    43→        'POST /multitrack': 'Analyze multiple audio tracks for multicam { audioPaths: [], speakerNames: [], videoTrackMapping: {} }',
    44→        'POST /multitrack/auto-balance': 'Auto-balance speaker screentime { audioPaths: [], speakerNames: [] }',
    45→        'POST /multitrack/advanced-balance': 'Advanced GA-optimized balancing { audioPaths: [], maxConsecutiveSeconds: 30, momentumFactor: 0.7 }',
    46→        'POST /process-xml': 'Process FCP XML { xmlPath, silences, removeGaps: true }',
    47→        'POST /cut-list': 'Generate JSON cut list for DOM building (v3.5) { sourceName, sourcePath, duration, silences, takes?, settings? }',
    48→        'POST /cut-list/takes': 'Generate cut list keeping only takes { sourceName, sourcePath, duration, takes, settings? }',
    49→        'POST /zoom': 'Generate zoom points from transcript { transcript, settings: { frequency, preset, placement } }',
    50→        'GET /zoom/presets': 'Get available zoom presets and frequencies',
    51→        'POST /chapters': 'Detect chapters in transcript using AI { transcript, settings: { maxChapters, minChapterLength } }',
    52→        'POST /chapters/fallback': 'Detect chapters without AI (gap-based) { transcript, settings }',
    53→        'POST /isolate-vocals': 'Isolate vocals from audio { audioPath }',
    54→        'POST /batch/silences': 'Batch process multiple files for silence detection { files: [], options: {} }',
    55→        'GET /batch/status/:jobId': 'Get batch job status',
    56→        'GET /batch/results/:jobId': 'Get full batch job results',
    57→        'GET /batch/jobs': 'List all batch jobs',
    58→        'DELETE /batch/:jobId': 'Delete a batch job',
    59→        'GET /credits': 'Get user credit balance (requires x-stripe-customer-id header)',
    60→        'GET /usage-history': 'Get usage history (requires x-stripe-customer-id header)',
    61→        'POST /webhooks/stripe': 'Stripe webhook endpoint',
    62→        'GET /referral/code': 'Get or create referral code for user',
    63→        'POST /referral/validate': 'Validate a referral code',
    64→        'POST /referral/apply': 'Apply referral code at signup',
    65→        'GET /referral/stats': 'Get referral statistics for user',
    66→        'POST /license/activate': 'Activate license key { key: "SPLICE-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX" }',
    67→        'GET /license/key': 'Get license key for customer (requires x-stripe-customer-id)',
    68→        'POST /license/resend': 'Resend license key to customer email { customerId? }'
    69→      }
    70→    });
    71→  });
    72→
    73→  /**
    74→   * GET /health - Health check
    75→   */
    76→  router.get('/health', (req, res) => {
    77→    res.json({ status: 'ok', service: 'splice-backend' });
    78→  });
    79→
    80→  /**
    81→   * GET /ffprobe-check - Check if FFprobe is installed
    82→   */
    83→  router.get('/ffprobe-check', async (req, res) => {
    84→    const installed = await isFFprobeInstalled();
    85→    res.json({
    86→      installed,
    87→      message: installed
    88→        ? 'FFprobe is available'
    89→        : 'FFprobe not found. Install with: brew install ffmpeg'
    90→    });
    91→  });
    92→
    93→  /**
    94→   * GET /replicate-check - Check if Replicate API is configured
    95→   */
    96→  router.get('/replicate-check', async (req, res) => {
    97→    const configured = isReplicateConfigured();
    98→    res.json({
    99→      configured,
   100→      message: configured
   101→        ? 'Replicate API is configured'
   102→        : 'REPLICATE_API_TOKEN not set. Add to .env file.'
   103→    });
   104→  });
   105→
   106→  return router;
   107→}
   108→
   109→module.exports = createHealthRoutes;
   110→

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.2"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.2"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="14.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

                        </MaxSize>

                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.text: All edits complete. Now let me verify by searching for any remaining old version numbers:

The remaining matches are in `package-lock.json` files, which are automatically generated and will be updated when `npm install` is run. These are not source files that need manual editing. The `6.0.2` entries in those files refer to npm package dependencies (not SPLICE version numbers).

Let me also confirm no old versions remain in the actual source files:

Only `package-lock.json` files contain old version numbers, which is expected. These are auto-generated files that will update when running `npm install`. All source files have been updated.
